profile_positions.description:
Chemical Technician within MCEC at University of Utrecht
Research in the field of quantum dot and colloidal synthesis
Ornsteinlab, UU Utrecht, prof. A. van Blaaderen

Activities:
- Design of new synthesis routes of different types of QDs (quantum dots)
- Production of different types of nanoparticles and colliods
- Supervising students and PhD's
- Design of protocols for Lab safety
- Order chemicals and keep the chemical database up-to-date
- Emergency response (BHV'er gevaarlijke stoffen) and first aid
- AMCP'er (arbo en milieu contactpersoon)

Courses:
- MCEC summerschool 2015, 2017
- Colloid science (master course UU), 2017

Techniques:
TEM, absorption techniques (UV-VIS, Emmision, QY), ICP-OES
profile_positions.title: Chemical Technician/Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Secretary at Jong KNCV
President: Marc de Sitter

Responsible for all communication between Jong KNCV (Young Royal Dutch Chemical Society) and externals. Organisation of several events, such as compagny visits and CCE (C2W career event).
